I dont known why people's are giving like these negative comment, im fully satisfied with this riding app good driver acceptence rate is fare now im using this app for 1 month. Im very happy
Bug-free app and a reliable mode of travel which is a very good alternative to Uber & Ola

This app is a fraudsters it shows 485 rs then i'll pick up for a ride it show 536 rs, what kind of app is you guys are developed.And never show a correct spot when then driver is arrived am totally unsatisfied to use this kind of app
Best app to use in Kochi cab rides. No issues of cancelling . cabs are available all the time. UI exp is on par with uber and ola
Drivers are very welcoming. Thank you, Yatri for such beneficial, democratized, and decentralized thought in leveraging ONDC.

Not even good for one star. They had charged my extra 60 rupees stating the ride is 2.3 km longer although the destination location is correct. I really fed up with this app and don't recommend anyone to use this fraudulent app.
💯% made by Indians & made for Indians.

This app is not at all working and started fake estimate system too..just for a 6 km ride they had shown 210 rs before starting ride and after ride 224 as poped up price..no ethics and customer care people not responding too.. uber is better than our kerala yatri app..helloo i got yr mail to reply details to the mentioned id..i sent reply but got a message the the id you ve provided is no longer exits..whts hpng?

Driver charged more than the fare shown in app. Emailed the support team of app but no response even after 2 days. No use of support team. Please don't use this app. Edit: Their support email id is invalid.

This app is not at all working and started fake estimate system too..just for a 6 km ride they had shown 210 rs before starting ride and after ride 224 as poped up price..no ethics and customer care people not responding too.. uber is better than our kerala yatri app.

When ride start time showing amount is 304 after ride complete then ride completed to my location and showing 319 and.4 km extra why this showing with out ride extra
good to enjoy a comfortable journey
Driver charged more than the fare shown in app. Emailed the support team of app but no response even after 2 days. No use of support team. Please don't use this app.

This app recommends 2 wheeler routes for a cab and when you take the actual route, it overcharges you. Customer service gives blunt replies like We will look into it or we are trying to fix the maps! Your money wasted. No refunds, not even an offer of refund! Uninstalling. Update: Thank you for automated reply but where are my refunds?

I'm not able to sign up now, shows there is some error. Plus, once I booked for a cab through another number, and the app was updating, the cab came and I couldn't see the details as the app was not opening. Since updates, there has been issues with this app.

I had a very bad experience from yatri. I booked a cab using yatri but the rates were on higher side so I canceled it. Again when I tried to book the cab got the same. Immediately the cab driver called me and shouted at me for canceling the cab earlier. This is very very bad behavior. This app is only supporting cab drivers not the users. Cab driver's mostly misuse the option of adding extra charge and users are not allowed to cancel the cab if they are not ok with the rates. Dispointed !!!!!
usually we choose Uber. first time in yathri. felt very much good

Horrible experience. Got fooled by the initial price while booking. It showed me 1600 for my trip when started, so I booked it since ola was showing 1800. But after reaching my place, the fair changed to 2060. 400rs more. Never seen such a drastic change in the price in any of the apps. Used it for the first time, and that would be the last as well. Should have gone for ola, atleast I could have saved 200rs. Don't fall for the fake reviews in play store

Right from the inception of this app, I have been a consumer. And at first the rates were very competitive and sensible. Now the rates have been increased and compared to Uber, it is very much on the higher side.
When internet is on App is auto online issue
Am very satisfied, safe yaatra and fair price 🙏🙏thank you Yatri 🥰
need bike and cab ride also for all over india.
Useless app...the drivers keep on cancelling the ride
if this is continuing in this matter, I would love to go to the heights, best alternative for the cab drivers n the general public..... hope the app gets upgraded to be more user friendly.

It says fare does not change with surge, but the fare always increases by the end of the trip. There is no system present to compensate for this. All they say when you call customer support is that we will give the drivers a slap on the wrist. How is that fixing the problem?
Actual fare was higher than shown.. bad experience

Not only once But the fare has raised four times for me. Not for 10/-. It goes more than 70 80/-. It looks like scam now. Shows something but while drop it increases like anything. There's no option for complaint. It's my 4th time since I did not get any refund of the excess money cut also. Knowingly drives take the longer rout. If you tell to follow the map, they will say road issue or traffic issue is there and they will take other root. Initially it was good but not these days.
The amount shown after the trip is Rs 30/- to Rs 40/- more than at the time of booking.
Charging extra amount after dropping..... Totaly dissatisfied.... If i had any option for zero rating i would give that
Cheaper charges ! But you MUST improve your destination suggestions. Its so hard to find a place.
Drivers are always taking different routes and final amount gets added every single time. Uninstalling this app.
drivers are demanding more cash for their rides, last time one driver made.rash comments after I objected his request at the airport, and he asked me to quit the car.
Well maintained in all the manner..
drivers are not available in this app

You should add feature to your app, to include add mobile no (attached to particular ride) at time of booking, so cab can be booked on behalf of guests and visitors whose mobile no can be included for that specific ride to get directly updated once ride is confirmed and booked.

The app gives you one rate and the driver at the destination claim extra charges based on update in the App. Even if you travel less or get down before destination without deviation. The app says you have travelled extra 2 km . From my own experience better keep away from this cheaters.
lmmediate drivers availability, easy to use app
The drivers keep cancelling our rides. Yatri had claimed to be better than Uber. You are not..
Off late we are not getting rides in yatri it was very convenient n drivers n cars r very good in kochi..but past a month not getting rides at valley is it stopped operation in kochi plz reply
This was my first ride in yatri cab, the ride was smooth, I reached at the destination on time and the price was affordable. Thank you yatri cab services.
Drivers are always taking different routes and final amount gets added every single time.
rate offered and final rate were different
100 times better than Uber and Ola in all aspects.
I never get an OTP whenever I try to register which has happened more than 5times they need to fix this

I dont know why this stupid app rated above 4 star rating..this app is completely a fraud.. customers are charging high...than given rate while we booking....last week i had booked taxi through..yatri app..charged approximate 30 to 50 rs high...for a normal route...i had gven a complaint to customer two to three times but everytime when they pick the call...customer care agents will ask "what is the issue.."..i have been waiting for either a favourable reply or a reasonable reply...nothiing.
i would give 5 star..but don't understand why they show 1 price and when we land it's higher

Will show a price range from low to high and people get hooked with low range. Once you book the ride, it will automatically bumped to the highest range and we will get to know about this only once you end the trip. This way we end up in paying more than any other cab service in India. The drivers are absolutely horrible and don't respect anyone.

Showing a range of amount, but drivers always asking the highest amount. Then what is the use of showing the range. Earlier the ride amount was low compared to other applications, now there is no difference.
When internet is on App is auto online issue

Worst service. Unprofessional drivers. Rates are onpar with uber. Doesnot recommend.
Reasonable price, but not found any option for book the cab in advance for a perticular time,
Worst drivers I got from this app.Compare to other app price is low.Please do the needful.
I have tried to get yatri several times. But did not get whenever I wanted I am Very happy with them. Pl see that I get it whenever I want them. Thank u Meena Menon.
I booked a trip suddenly it got cancelled and continue 3 times .try to fix this issue.
better than Uber in terms of the price rates . but UI and customer service are not upto the mark.
Please fix your auto update with both users and drives. It's getting stuck at start trip.
The app wont work.. I updated it. Waiting for an hour for it to work. Still it freezes when it comes to confirming the ride.
Very easy to use but expensive for a place you can go to for 30₹ to 150₹
useful app , they provide budget friendly trips 😃

The App is seen closed immediately after opening . This has happened many times and I urinstalled it. Today when I opened the app and booked the ride immediately after booking the app was seen closed .Then I booked ride in UBER and the the driver was on the way I got a call from the driver of YATRI and I cancelled the ride with Uber and travelled by Yatri cab. The driver wanted to close the app as he will not get another ride. Eventhough I restarted the phone the problem persists

Pros: (1) Immediate allocation of vehicle since simultaneously they send booking to multiple vehicles and whoever picks first gets the ride (2)Price is 20-30% cheaper than Uber or Ola Cons: (1)If you are away from Cochin location you cannot access the invoice copies which you have rode earlier (2)There is no email forward facility,you have to download and forward the invoice (3)There is no yatri logo in the invoice,if you are travelling for official purpose,the finance dept tend to ask
Good experience. Lower rates. Glad that the drivers get the full fare.
Best service , cheaper than uber & ola
Pick up location is wrongly given than what is registered.
Really good initiative which helps both the customer and drivers economically
First time use - worked as expected.
Horrible app. Scamimg people by showing lower charge first then increasing it . Very horrible app DO NOT DOWNLOAD
This facility is not available in Thiruvananthapuram.
it's very nice to hear that our country own this app..affordable and cheapest ride is available in this ap,p
Very professional and well mannered driver

Fare wise very good than other apps and would suggest if you've plenty of time left to travel. Won't suggest if you're in hurry as the location issues mentioned in other reviews still persist I think. Give try for sure and be ready to get cancelled by drivers who are very unprofessional. Will update this review by time and more experience👍🏻 Update : App's crashing at certain points, would be good if that's solved.
They are live only in kochi.
Very easy to use... Very good.

Initially showed fare range ₹173-₹213 for booking. Driver confirmed ₹176, but on ride start, fare unexpectedly surged to ₹193, causing confusion and disappointment. Requesting improved pricing transparency to avoid such discrepancies in the future. So riders be careful about these hidden charges.
My yatri ride was hassle free & cheap. Looking forward to more such experiences.
Auto cancels my rides, I called the driver they found the ride cancelled but I didn't cancel the ride it auto cancelled,fix this issue
easily accessible.. rates that much not different with uber... anyway nice app...
Such a great app! Drivers and customers all happy 💜

Commission amount of ola and uber is just too much for customer as well as vehicle partner with no additional benefits. Yatri only needs to ascertain that the vehicles maintain neatness and hygiene inside the vehicle.
very good app nd cheapest ride
Better rates, clean cars and most importantly the driver's earnings are much better. It's a Win-Win-Win case. ie Driver- Customer- Service Provider . All the very best
Drive dropped me safe.No trouble caused.Thanks to Yatri
An app that is well made and a good option for both drivers as well as passengers.
Opted for sedan car but car which came was Hyundai Eon . Charge shown was Rs 219; but after booking it became Rs 249.
Super fast availability in Kakkanad. With better rates than Uber and Ola.

Good experience so far! Rates are lower than other established players. Only suggestion would be to improve the location accuracy of the map. Drivers keep going in circles when they reach close to pick up location. Upon checking, drivers said the map doesn't show the accurate location.
It's crashing all the times... today i tried to book but it stopped working... After 10 minutes one driver calling it's booked... How can I find it in a crashed app
great app for all people.All of you must try.Price is very less between the other apps
best taxi service available in kochi,it's cheap comfortable highly recommended

Yathri is a great Make In India & Made In Kerala Initiative.....Encourage you all to promote this Driver Assist App ad it improves the livelihood of Driver Communities & Families and also provides clean, hygienic cars as well as well mannered drivers.
Very reliable and dependable app for travel. most of the time with lower rates comparative to other travel apps. I strongly believe in supporting our indegenous local agency.

cleen car good service best cab in kochi

good service, cheaper than others, quick to reach

Driver had cancelled the trip after calling and confirming pick up location. Really pathetic first time experience. Would rethink before booking as initial experience is embarassing.

I used Yatri app and made 6 trips in Ernakulam district. I found all of these rides very good, keeping to the appointed time and much cheaper than Uber and Ola. The conduct of the drivers were also quite pleasant and helpful. The first two rides I could not get the maps to track. But once expressed my opinion about it, I saw improved service with map tracking included. Proud of this customer friendly service. Perhaps the limitation of Yatri is that its service is limited to Ernakulam district.
very nice pics and beautiful thanks
very good app for riders , Fares are very competitive compared to other booking apps, using this app for the past 3 months , im very satisfied.
Can be a choice. Very good ambience
Very professional and customer friendly. Normal fare.Happy to avail services.

Really, this trip was a maiden one. I never travelled via YATHRI. I feel very comfortable and friendly. I think the fare too was little bit low rather than other tour operator. I prefer Yathri for my all future rides.
very good service and very good app

Initially the App was having issues which got resolved with updates, but recently I was overcharged after the complaint the app is now giving error. No response from customer care or tech team.
Very bad service. Whenever I booked it shows 5-10 minutes but even after 20 minutes, it shows the same time. There is no response to calls.
It is a functional service. On Sundays in Kochin there seems no service as most of the drivers hailing from outside take weeke nds off to visit home.

Very bad experience . Last week I booked a cab and the rate shown was Rs 258 after applying offer of Rs 50/_. Once the trip was completed the app was showing Rs 316/_ The driver was also clueless.One contacting customer service no proper response was got. The reply to mail came as they will look into it. It's almost 3 days now and no reply or solution is given.. This is typical goonda attitude from yatri and I warn all of you to take a screen shot of the trip booking page as proof .
Good service, far better than uber
Pathetic. Most of the time calls dont get connected. Distance and time shown for pick up are incorrect. Please improve the app. On the positive side tariff is reasonable.

Very bad experience after initial 2 or 3 rides. Whenever book it show car is 1 min or 3 min away but car will never reach even after wait long time. One time ride got automatically cancelled after waiting 15 min or more. Last time also same experience. If want to go for an urgent ride difficult to trust. No responsible people to manage it and not giving any value for our time. Very bad experience.
Drivers keep cancelling. No way to contact driver. Only once could call. Navigating and locating drivers difficult.
Unable to book another cab. During drop time driver update the app and my stuck inside the app.. Still it showing trip navigation.. Rest Good app but need updation..

Hi,   I just want to let you know that the Switch button to turn on the online status of the yatri service doesn't toggle when we swipe to turn on or off. Only click event is toggling the service.  Maybe using onCheckedChangedListener instead of onClickListener for the Switch will fix the problem.

Now its on a pathetic stage. This app needs more development. And about the fare. Fare are to be justifying to both customer and driver, but here I think its one sided towards driver. So about fare it is simply higher.
It's the worst app I have ever used. They book at low rate and charge really high. This unnacceptable. Very poor customer service. They said will call back and never does it.

Very Good app..but need more updation.. But app needs to b technically developed further.. 1. option for saving Google location not there. 2.app is slow sometimes.
Update - No response or fix to issue which I highlighted many weeks ago. Not getting otp itself to finish installation after putting mobile number during sign on. Unable to use app as a result.
